channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT

item.title: Report X-2023110091
item.description:
Report X-2023110091

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-21T18:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-24
  • City: NORTH SALT LAKE
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: LEAKING FLAMMABLE LIQUID DURING TRANSIT, UNLOADED, PLACED INSIDE A HAZMAT BAG AND RED HAZMAT TOTE. DescribePack: LOOSE CAPS LEAKING FLAMMABLE LIQUID INSIDE A WET SOILED BOX SOILING ALL CONTENTS INSIDE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PLACED INSIDE A HAZMAT BAG AND RED HAZMAT TOTE.

DescribePack: BOX DROPPED AND CRACKED THE CAPS AND LEAKED CORROSIVE LIQUID INSIDE A CRUSHED DENTED WET SOILED BOX. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PLACED INSIDE A HAZMAT BAG AND RED HAZMAT TOTE.

item.title: Report X-2023101196
item.description:
Report X-2023101196

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-18
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED TO A LEAKER ON DOOR 400, RESPONDER ARRIVED AT PACKAGE ON THE GROUND WITH AS MEDIUM SIZE PUDDLE. USING DECISION TREE AND PROPER PPE, RESPONDER CLEANED UP SPILL AND RETURNED TO CLERKS FOR PROCESSING
